channel.title: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?
channel.description: When I run it after I login and click it the client shuts down How do I fix this from happening?

item.title: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

I had this exact problem with deltascape client the other day, so i replaced the run.bat with this:

@echo off cd source "C:\Program Files (x86)\java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe" -Xmx512m -cp Theme.jar;Client.jar; Gui @echo on

Then it started working,
But now i’m trying to do it on my own client but i can’t run it… It just shuts the client down after about 5 seconds… Yes i’m using windows 7 64-bit, Can anyone solve this?

Thanks

(And that might solve some peoples clients ^^^, But not mine!) ;[

Read full topic
item.source: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?

item.title: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?

item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Superd00d, post:8, topic:327046”]Windows 7 cannot run the clients.[/quote]i got windows 7 64 bit and it works fine to me but i reinstalled windows cus my previous 64bit was like 30 seconds in the client and it crashed i guess it fixed itself after reinstalling windows

item.source: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?

item.title: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?
item.dc:creator: @Rat_racer550 Rat racer550
item.description:
@Rat_racer550 wrote:

Windows 7 can in fact run the client. I had this problem. All you have to do is edit your run.bat or runserver.bats path.
Say i’m using devolution client?
the regular class path is this.: JAVA -Xmx1024m client 0 0 highmem members 0
but for windows 7 users it’s this.: "C:/program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 0 0 highmem members 0
Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does my client shutdown after a short while after I run it?
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

I think if you are running the server on you’r computer -With out using the Vps- the client will close because you are opening the run

OR

You are putting a Auto Restarter Like after 5 min, And you are running the Server-Without using a Vps- And opening client, then it will close…
